main event: On February 23, 1954, witnesses reported seeing a fiery rod object with a fiery tail about the size of 30 feet traveling at high speed near Lake City, Powell Station, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was described as a rod shape with a fiery tail,The sighting lasted only a few moments and the object moved at a very high speed,The sighting was categorized under various potential explanations including balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena,The characteristics of the object's motion were detailed as consistent and notable,No photograph was taken during the sighting.
witness description: Mr. R. E. Powell, who reported the sighting.
